translation: I am delighted, having seen something never seen before; yet my mind is distressed with fear. Show me that form only, O God; have mercy, O God of gods, O Abode of the universe.
commentary: 11.45 Unseen before what was never seen before? delighted delighted? I am (I) am? seeing having seen? Bhayen with fear? f and? Pravyathitam is distressed? Mind mind? Me my? That that? Eve only? Me to me? Show show? God O God? form form? Please have mercy? Devesh O Lord of the gods? Jagannivasa O Aboe of the universe.Commentary For an ordinary man the Cosmic Form (Vision) is overwhelming and terrifying but
